compatibility.notes: The BSD-4-Clause license is permissive and allows for integration with various other licenses, provided that the terms of the original license are maintained.

key_requirements: Include the copyright notice, list of conditions, and disclaimer in all redistributions.
Acknowledge the use of the software in advertising materials.
license.name: BSD-4-Clause
obligations: Retain the copyright notice in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce the copyright notice in redistributions in binary form.
Include an acknowledgment in advertising materials mentioning features or use of the software.
Obtain specific prior written permission to use the name of the copyright holder or contributors for endorsement or promotion.
